about_the_game:
First Dwarf: First Island is a FREE introduction of our upcoming action RPG game, First Dwarf, combining many unique elements together: base building, colony survival, tower defense, colony building, action, strategy.

All of that and more will test your survival and exploration skills! Experience the wonders of dwarven engineering and make the most of the first island ready to colonize! Ready, after you prepare it for your first colony, that is.



Planet Driftland is in pieces. After many wars it shattered completely. The Clan of the Northern dwarves still carries hope that somewhere far away there is a better place to live and that the days of hunger and sadness will end.

Game features:

  • Explore the world in mana-powered mechanical armor. Upgrade it to unlock new exciting abilities that will help you discover more locations in the vast open world in the clouds.
  • Build various structures to defend yourself and to establish a new colony for your people.
  • Fight numerous dangers of the Driftland’s wildlands. Secure the area and make it more hospitable for dwarven settlers.
  • Uncover the mysterious secrets of the ancients, while unveiling the story of the hero's family.
  • Play as Ragna The Dragon and help your dwarven protagonist explore the world of Driftlands

That’s why YOU have been chosen to become the First Dwarf. As our main protagonist Tru, you need to gather resources, find and craft new technologies and build new colony for your settlers. Build your base, houses for the settlers, stone mines, sawmills and more, and connect them with mana pipelines. Mana is the main source of energy, so make sure to always have enough of it! Grant everyone safety by making proper preparations in advance! Place defensive turrets and walls where you need them, fight evil monster waves with your loyal ax and destroy their nests, so they won’t bother your Clan anymore.



Clear combat system based on combos will help you manage the evil monsters attacking your settlement. Beware of the Tainted beings! But they are not the only thing you’ll encounter! Some of the wild animals here are acting strange and may need your help… Will you stop by and try to solve this issue? The choice is yours.

On this amazing but dangerous adventure, you’re accompanied by a mighty dragon, Ragna. Thanks to her, you can fly high in the sky, look for enemies from above, get to otherly inaccessible places and breath fire! What’s not to love about her!



You can switch through characters anytime you want - run around as a dwarf Tru, fight with a powerful mech or flap your wings as Ragna. Each of the characters has their unique skills to upgrade and discover. Thanks to that, you’ll be able to search the island far and wide.



First Dwarf: First Island will prepare you for the upcoming demanding challenges. Explore more islands, visit ancient Eskoim ruins, fight new enemy types, get rare items and discover new technologies further in the final game in order to get to know all the secrets of Driftland! Destroy the dangerous evil once and for all and bring peace to this shattered world. Maybe you’ll be able to find the truth about Tru’s father's past and clear his name among the dwarves? Take the fate in your hand and make history as the First Dwarf!

short_description: FREE PROLOGUE! Hop on the mech and find a new home for your dwarven people! Build a base, defend your colony and explore the floating islands of the fantasy world of Driftland in this immersive action RPG! And that’s only the beginning…
